name: EvaporativeCooling
publications: B.A. McKinney, D. M. Reif, B. C. White, J. E. Crowe Jr., J. H. Moore. "Evaporative cooling feature selection for genotypic data involving interactions." Bioinformatics 2007, 23: 2113-2120.

B.A. McKinney, J.E. Crowe, Jr., J. Guo, and D. Tian, "Capturing the spectrum of interaction effects in genetic association studies by simulated evaporative cooling network analysis," 2009, PLoS Genetics 2009, 5(3): e1000432.
description: a program for filtering genetic association data.
